content:
Hi,
We want to allow zulip users to reply stream messages through their email.
I try to follow the article below.
https://zulip.readthedocs.io/en/latest/production/email-gateway.html
However, I don't understand how to configure incoming email gateway on zulip (I am using docker zulip image)
Is there a document that shows how to configure incoming email gateway on zulip docker?
Thank you so much. :)
